name: Electroknit
description:
The concept of 'Duality', we can't help but thinkabout the great work our grandmothers do. With that affection we offer the experience of helping those who need it, being a grandmother who builds bridges or a child defending his grandmother.

Set in a tiny world with enemies who want to end our adventure

⭐Programación: Luis "Ali" Mora  y Sebastian "PsychoBun" Flores

⭐3D y animación: Nicolás Velasquez V. 

⭐Arte, música y SFX: Meli "Msist" Yensen ♥
